alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether and southwestern Pike Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Harris City, or over Greenville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Woodbury, Warm Springs, Molena, Raleigh, Durand, Harris City and Imlac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
